reviews.review: S.A OYUNDA ÇOK BOT VAR BİRAZ TEMİZLEYİN
Seçkin Hesap Değilseniz Hilelerin Arasında Yüzeceğiniz Ama Seçkin Hesapsanız Klasik CS Oyunlarından Biri
Bardzo fajna strzelanka, fajnie można się wjebywać w mołotowy sojuszników
When you play CS:GO, you just say “Rush B” and go

PROs:-
-Easy to learn, hard to master
-Fun to play with friends
-Pure aim skill, no ADSing
-Requires strategic thinking and tactics
-Can be played with different playstyles
-Balanced, no exploitable system involving classes or abilities, no RNG, no pay-to-win
-Different situations call for getting out of your comfort zone

CONs:-
-Anticheat could use improvement
-Inactive players get deranked leading to them getting matched up with lesser skilled players

I personally enjoy the skins, music and items as well but that's subjective.

Teaming up with randoms can either make or break your day and that varies from person to person, but I'm not including that in my pros/cons since Valve isn't responsible for teaming you up with players who are toxic, wholesome, or noobs.

EDIT AFTER JUNE 3 2021 UPDATE: THANK YOU GABEN, THANK YOU VALVE!

JAN 26 2022 EDIT: DXB to BOM ping/routing issues, pls fix

FEB 17 2022 EDIT: ROUTING FIXED, W
